thread.title: A fuss-free guide to travelling in Singapore (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: A fuss-free guide to travelling in Singapore (VIDEO)

title: A fuss-free guide to travelling in Singapore (VIDEO)
text:
A fuss-free guide to travelling in Singapore (VIDEO) Thursday July 9, 2015 Print Article 
SINGAPORE, July 9 — For those who wants to drop by to visit our southern neighbour Singapore, here’s a fuss-free travel guide from Attaché. 
Hosted by Alex Hunter, the video guides you through Singapore with tips, tricks, eats and drinks for your next visit to city-state. 
It includes travel tips and fees, and more importantly, how to stay out of trouble during your visit. 
Alex Hunter guides you through a visit to Singapore in this screenshot taken from the Attaché video. More Stories for You:
